title: ID Fancy Font please
content:
Thanks for looking ...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129234553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/warm%20hearts_6196.jpg)

 [‹ What font is this?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129234553/http:/typophile.com/node/39526 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif Typeface ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129234553/http:/typophile.com/node/39515 "Go to next forum topic")
author: link

comments.content: If you are Howard, then Akira has already given you [the answer](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129234553/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=101748).

For those who are interested: The answer was [LTC Fournier Le Jeune](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129234553/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-fournier-le-jeune/regular/), Lanston Type Company.

:) I’m not Howard ...  
Thanks for the ID  
very much appreciated!  
LinK

Oh, then sorry for the wrong accusation. Have a nice day.

BTW, what or where is that sample from, that two different people are searching for it in a quite small timeframe?
